relations.detail: ARIS 使用动词分类来解决算术问题，而 Equation Template 则依赖于模板匹配。
relations.problem_addressed: 比较两种不同的方法在解决算术问题上的效果。
relations.evidence: We report the first learning results on this task without reliance on pre-defined templates and make our data publicly available.

relations.detail: ARIS 使用动词分类，而 SigmaDolphin 使用语义解析和推理模块。
relations.problem_addressed: 比较两种不同方法在解决算术问题上的性能。
relations.evidence: Our system, analyzes each of the sentences to identify the relevant variables and their attributes; and automatically maps this information into a higher level representation.

relations.detail: SigmaDolphin 使用 CFG 解析器和推理模块，而 Mapping to Declarative Knowledge 使用声明性规则。
relations.problem_addressed: 比较两种不同方法在解决数学问题上的性能。
relations.evidence: We develop declarative rules which govern the translation of natural language description of these concepts to math expressions.

relations.detail: ARIS 在 AddSub 数据集上进行了训练和测试。
relations.problem_addressed: 验证 ARIS 在简单加减法问题上的性能。
relations.evidence: We compiled a corpus of about 400 arithmetic(addition and subtraction) word problems and utilized cross validation to both train ARIS and evaluate its performance over this corpus.

relations.detail: SigmaDolphin 在 NDMC 数据集上进行了训练和测试。
relations.problem_addressed: 验证 SigmaDolphin 在数词问题上的性能。
relations.evidence: The works of Hosseini et al.(2014) and Mitra and Baral(2016) focus on arithmetic problems involving only addition and subtraction.

relations.detail: ARIS 使用 Accuracy_Classification 作为评估指标。
relations.problem_addressed: 评估 ARIS 在解决算术问题上的准确性。
relations.evidence: It is able to solve 77.7% of the problems in a corpus of standard primary school test questions.

relations.detail: SigmaDolphin 使用 F1_Score 作为评估指标。
relations.problem_addressed: 评估 SigmaDolphin 在解决数学问题上的性能。
relations.evidence: The works of Hosseini et al.(2014) and Mitra and Baral(2016) focus on arithmetic problems involving only addition and subtraction.
